Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE CONSTANCE R. GLUBE, Q.C., of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be the Chairperson of the Military Judges Compensation Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending August 31, 2015.
